Package sawtooth.sdk.messaging

Interface Stream

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZmqStream
    public interface Stream
extends AutoCloseable
    The client networking class.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        Future send​(sawtooth.sdk.protobuf.Message.MessageType destination,
            com.google.protobuf.ByteString contents)
        Send a message and return a Future that will later have the Bytestring.
        Parameters:
        destination - one of the Message.MessageType enum values defined in validator.proto
        contents - the ByteString that has been serialized from a Protobuf class
        Returns:
        future a future that will have ByteString that can be deserialized into a, for example, GetResponse

      • sendBack

        void sendBack​(sawtooth.sdk.protobuf.Message.MessageType destination,
              String correlationId,
              com.google.protobuf.ByteString contents)
        Send a message without getting a future back. Useful for sending a response message to, for example, a transaction
        Parameters:
        destination - Message.MessageType defined in validator.proto
        correlationId - a random string generated on the server for the client to send back
        contents - ByteString serialized contents that the server is expecting

      • receive

        sawtooth.sdk.protobuf.Message receive()
        Get a message that has been received.
        Returns:
        result, a protobuf Message

      • receive

        sawtooth.sdk.protobuf.Message receive​(long timeout)
                               throws TimeoutException
        Get a message that has been received. If the timeout is expired, throws TimeoutException.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to wait for a message.
        Returns:
        result, a protobuf Message
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - The Message is not received before timeout.
